title: DevLens
description: Quickly inspect page layouts and visualize element boundaries.

title: StyleSpy
description: Instantly analyze and copy CSS from any webpage element.

title: SpeedBoost
description: Optimizes browser resource usage to accelerate page loading.

title: SecureX
description: Protect your browsing data and block suspicious scripts.

title: PackStack
description: Easily manage downloads and organize your browser files.

title: TimeWise
description: Track screen time and reduce distractions while working.

title: Thinkr
description: AI-powered tool for summarizing articles and news feeds.

title: Fixify
description: Auto-detects and fixes layout bugs in developer view.

title: TabSort
description: Organize open tabs using categories and color codes.
